original.description: WikiHop is open-domain and based on Wikipedia articles; the goal is to recover Wikidata information by hopping through documents. The goal is to answer text understanding queries by combining multiple facts that are spread across different documents.

masked.description: WikiHop is open-domain and based on Wikipedia articles; the goal is to recover Wikidata information by hopping through documents. The goal is to answer text understanding queries by combining multiple facts that are spread across different documents.
